name: Don't Turn Your Back
description:
"Don't Turn Your Back" is a first-person stealth horror game inspired by the popular Doctor Who episode "Blink." In this game, players must navigate through a series of levels in an abandoned mall, while avoiding deadly enemies, who only move when the player is not looking directly at them. To survive, players must use the unique "blink" mechanic to strategically move through the levels, using the enemies' own abilities against them.

The game is set in an abandoned mall with different levels, players will have to use stealth and strategy to outsmart the enemies and uncover the secrets of the game's storyline. Along the way, players can collect power-ups and unlock new abilities to aid in their survival.

Built using Unreal Engine 5 and utilizing assets from the free November 2022 asset pack, "Don't Turn Your Back" offers players a terrifying and immersive experience unlike any other. With its unique blink mechanic, intense stealth gameplay, and spine-chilling atmosphere of an abandoned mall, this game is sure to keep players on the edge of their seats.

Features

  • Unique "blink" mechanic that allows players to outsmart enemies by strategically moving through levels
  • Immersive, abandoned mall setting with a variety of levels to explore
  • Stealth and strategy gameplay that challenges players to outsmart enemies and uncover the game's storyline
  • Built using Unreal Engine 5 and utilizing assets from the free November 2022 asset pack
  • Physical Interaction System for realistic interaction with objects in the game
  • Clothing and shoe stores assets to give a realistic mall environment
  • Loft Office (Modular) assets to give a realistic office setting
  • Animated Rain - Waterdrop Material & FX for added atmosphere and realism
  • Mouse and Keyboard control

Inputs

  • Left click to interact with buttons or items
  • Hold "C" to hold your blink
  • Press "R" to blink
  • Use "WASD" keys to move
  • Press "Spacebar" to jump
  • Use the "Mouse" to look around

Used assets

CLOTHING AND SHOE STORES, 

Physical Interaction System,

Loft Office (Modular), 

Animated Rain - Waterdrop Material & FX
